posts.post_title: Assorted T-206 Lot -- PSA graded - SOLD
posts.post_content: First person to post in this thread "I'll take 'em" gets these five cards shipped via USPS Priority Mail with Signature Confirmation for $225.  PayPal only!
Reduced to $210.  Hurry while it is still available!
I'll take them JP.  Email sent.
